name: Dexter's Revenge
description:
Dexter’s Revenge is a fully 3D interactive platformer fun game developed by Patricia Lepe (aka Crayontronic10)! Meet Dexter’s friend named Stormy and AutoBot, they are both pretty much a student. You will discover Dexter’s history of why he kidnapped a teacher named Eddy Johnson that made Dexter extremely jealous of something.

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to turn around. Left click to open doors and pick up items, right click to use the currently selected item. Hold down shift to run and press space bar to look behind you. Escape can be used to pause.

Foreword

1. Before you walk off thinking that this is just another Baldi clone, listen to what I have to say in the description.

Description

Give this game a chance at least. Yes, the gameplay is very similar to Baldi's Basics: Collecting notebooks, defending yourself from crazy teachers with the help of sodas, no running in the corridors during the lesson, SWEEP SWEEP SWEEP. But if you're still a fan of Baldi-like games and love horror and challenges, this game is just the right thing for you! The game will be a lot of fun, if you take your time to understand everything and don't give up on it just because you died a few times. The game is still under development, so stay tuned for updates!

Have fun and leave some feedback Tools used
